credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Design for a table clock
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and wash, traces of graphite on white laid paper
description:
Frontal view: A circular frame for dial, surrounded by laurel leaves, mounted on top of a fluted column draped with a garland. Structure sits on base decorated with knobs, cushion feet. 

Verso: Portrait of a young man, facing left, faintly seen.
name: Drawing
